entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
